title: Yes, I am bitter
author: VD
content_html:
I know that Arsenal was knocked out of the Champions League by Liverpool last night. I don’t want to talk about it. I especially don’t want to talk about the officiating.

Forget the problem of evil. A much knottier problem is the problem of FIFA officiating.
content_text:
I know that Arsenal was knocked out of the Champions League by Liverpool last night.  I don’t want to talk about it.  I especially don’t want to talk
about the officiating
.
Forget the problem of evil.  A much knottier problem is the problem of FIFA officiating.
